Text: NOTE: Episode 14 in this torrent, "The Last Roundup," is the original version, before they de-Derpy'd it.

Dude, you're breaking TBP; if you address all the things that whiny douche bags complain about, then how will they make themselves feel better about a life that includes as much complaining as they do  about free videos? You jerk. How dare you!
^_^  s'casm appreciated... but a dude, I am not...  Though there are people out there trying to make changes to issues like that (and I think most of them live in Japan).

Been trying to upload the update for quite a while now.  Unfortunately, it's a no-go.  TPB is having a server-hemorrhage of some sort, and all I get is the following response, no matter how I alter the entries:

Any help?

Try dem on id.me or kat .ph
Wow, I get a database error if I type in either of the two sites listed above, without the spaces.  That's messed up.
Is there anyway I can contact you because I really hope to get the other episodes.

My SO is paranoid, so I don't do real pictures or direct links, e-mail, etc.  Got enough creepy stuff in the past to agree with him.
However, the final version is complete, and bizarrely got upped quickly and smoothly:
